news.title: Israel's plan means more misery for Palestinians and big risk for Netanyahu
news.summary: Takeover raises the prospect of curfews, evacuation orders and exhausted civilians on the road once more.

news.title: Police 'sat on information' before man, 80, killed
news.summary: Officers had been investigating an attack on another Asian man, two weeks before Bhim Kohli died.

news.title: New signs found of giant gas planet in 'Earth's neighbourhood'
news.summary: The possible planet is just four-and-a-half light years away and may have moons that sustain life.

news.title: Teenager found guilty of murdering fellow pupil during lunch break
news.summary: Harvey Willgoose, 15, was stabbed at All Saints Catholic High School in Sheffield in February.

news.title: Fourth heatwave of summer set to bring temperatures above 30C next week
news.summary: Storm Floris brought wind and rain at the start of this week but fortunes are set to change with sunshine and heat in the forecast.

news.title: Sturgeon memoir describes arrest as 'worst day of my life'
news.summary: The first extracts from the former first minister's new memoir are being serialised by The Times.

news.title: NCA to investigate police officer sex abuse claims after BBC report
news.summary: South Yorkshire Police will not investigate itself over reports officers sexually abused children.

news.title: River Island to close 33 more stores after court approves rescue plan
news.summary: The struggling High Street retailer had warned it would run out of cash by the end of August.

news.title: MP Rupert Lowe mistakes charity rowers for 'illegal migrants'
news.summary: Rupert Lowe says he will donate Â£1,000 to charity but makes "no apologies over being vigilant".

news.title: Boy, 4, dies after being hit by bus as he walked out of hospital
news.summary: The father of four-year-old Zaahir Jan pays tribute to his "always smiling and laughing" son.
